channel.title: Lol! I saw a Mopar truck!
channel.description:
Today, when I was coming home from a test (the big one - state test - middle school) and guess what I saw? :rolleyes:
A Mopar truck!!! :eek: I was all like, "Holy crap! That's friggin' sweet!", and guess what was on the side of the truck?
The Mopar symbol! Lol! If you don't know what I'm talking about, look at the banner at the top of the site and it was one of those moving m's.
So, I guess mopar is based off a company of some sort?
Post if you want. As long it stays in this subject. :D

item.title: Lol! I saw a Mopar truck!
item.dc:creator: @nejat nejat
item.description:
@nejat wrote:

haha i learned what Mopar was like 1-2 weeks ago. i thought mopar was just a nickname or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Lol! I saw a Mopar truck!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“AARisAIR, post:42, topic:2541”][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=2772.msg26295#msg26295 date=1147146356]
What you think I made up the name and symbol and then called it the best? rofl

Mopar stands for Dodge, Plymouth, Chrysler, and Jeep, which are all car companies jointly referred to as Mopar, I think they make the best cars, therefore my name: moparisthebest

rather simple and makes sense doesnt it?
[/quote]

Quoted for Major Truth go PLYMOUTH! Wow I didnt know so many people didnt know what mopar was…jeeze.[/quote]

sad isnt it? we need to educate these kids

Read full topic

not built to last my ass
